short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy WhatsApp messages with just a click ⚡️

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 Simplify Message Copying on WhatsApp Web! 🚀

Revolutionize your WhatsApp Web experience effortlessly! Say goodbye to the hassle of manually selecting messages or dealing with truncated "Read More" texts. Our extension streamlines the way you copy messages, making it a breeze!

📋 Instant Copy Functionality:
No more painstakingly selecting messages! Click once to instantly copy entire messages, regardless of length. Say farewell to tedious dragging and selecting – it's that simple!

🔍 Effortless "Read More" Handling:
Tired of interrupted messages due to "Read More" prompts? Our extension seamlessly navigates these. No need to click and select again; copy messages with ease, even after encountering "Read More" prompts.

✨ Enhanced Efficiency, Zero Frustration:
Experience a seamless messaging flow! Our extension's intuitive copy icon simplifies interactions, eliminating the frustration of manual selection and accidental selections of neighbouring messages.

📎 Embrace a New Era of Messaging Ease:
Enhance your messaging routine effortlessly. Our user-friendly copy icon seamlessly integrates within WhatsApp Web, transforming copying tasks into a single-click affair.

🙌 Join the list of users who've simplified their WhatsApp Web experience. Start today and bid farewell to the hassle of message selection!
